Name: main
Reason for Prioritization: Central orchestration logic directly coordinates multiple subsystems and is critical for system stability.

Name: route_request
Reason for Prioritization: Request routing logic is complex and directly affects API correctness and reliability.

Name: predict_batch
Reason for Prioritization: Inference routine combines multiple responsibilities and impacts runtime prediction behavior.

Name: compute_metrics
Reason for Prioritization: Evaluation logic influences experimental outcomes and must remain correct and maintainable.

Name: train_model
Reason for Prioritization: Training pipeline logic is central to model quality and involves many processing stages.

Name: pipeline
Reason for Prioritization: Pipeline module aggregates several concerns and represents a frequent modification hotspot.

Name: update_schema
Reason for Prioritization: Database schema changes propagate across multiple components and are error-prone.

Name: ExperimentManager
Reason for Prioritization: This class centralizes experiment logic and tightly couples multiple responsibilities.

Name: validate_config
Reason for Prioritization: Configuration branching increases risk but is moderately isolated.

Name: load_dataset
Reason for Prioritization: Dataset loader handles multiple cases and formats, affecting data consistency.

Name: resolve_dependencies
Reason for Prioritization: Dependency resolution logic contains nested conditionals with moderate impact.

Name: build_payload
Reason for Prioritization: Payload builder depends heavily on external client state but impact is localized.

Name: parse_args
Reason for Prioritization: Argument parsing interacts with CLI structure but is not system-critical.
